TopicTitle: APOLLO (SATURN-V with F1 & J2, APOLLO CSM, LEM, LLRV). by OLDD (v.1.4. 09.05.14)

Articles.Content: By brother and sister keep playing Party Gripp music in my face right while I'm trying to deploy the ALSEP (also Denny the scanner keeps exploding when it hits the ground when I try to drop it, and also when any of the ALSEP devices are on my Kerbals' back; they start walking in a weird fast glitchy manner)

*** I know this is off topic Denny but have you ever been to Baikonur?

yup, i been.

space thingies are my hobby for about 30 years, and i have visited spaceports. russian Baikonur (first time in 1993 and saw ENERGIA-M on launchpad and N-1 crashplaces (have a piece of N-1 ), Dombarovsky, US - Canaveral and Wallops, Euro Kourou in French Guiana, old french Hammaguir in Algeria, Italian sea spaceport San-Marco near coast of Kenia, Israeli Palmachim, Japan Tanegashima

I'm still having issues with the scanner. No matter how, where or when I drop the ALSEP scanner; it explodes on contact with the Mun (regardless of whether I have already pressed the "Deploy" button). It works fine on Kerbin, but haven't tested it out on Minmus.
